/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
/** Blog teaser: labeled view mode. */
.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled { margin-bottom: 1rem; margin-top: 0.5rem; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .media-blog-outer { width: 100%; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper { box-shadow: 0 0 5px #BFBFBF; position: relative; margin-top: 2.5rem; width: 100%; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper a, .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper a:active { color: #767676; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper img { max-width: 100%; height: auto; width: 100%; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .blog-link { width: 100%; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--image a { display: inline; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container { padding: 1.125rem; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container .label { font-family: 'Merriweather Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.75rem; margin-bottom: 0.5rem; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container h3 { font-size: 0.9375rem; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container .field--name-field-docdate { font-family: 'Lato Bold'; font-weight: 700; color: #767676; font-size: 0.625rem; letter-spacing: 0.1em; text-transform: uppercase; }

.node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container .field--type-text-with-summary { color: #767676; }

@media (min-width: 768px) { .node--type-blog.node--view-mode-teaser-labeled .blog-link-wrapper .teaser--content-container h3 { font-size: 1rem; margin-top: 0; } }

#block-views-block-blog-featured-topic--3 .views-row:last-child { margin-bottom: 2.65rem; }
